instructions: On your computer, go to Hangouts at hangouts.google.com or in Gmail . Click the Call tab . In the search box, type a phone number or name. To enter an international country code, click the menu or type it into the search box (for example, +55 for Brazil). Click the phone number or the name of the person you want to call. To enter an extension, click the dial pad . To end a call, close the Hangout window or click End call . The call will also end if you run out of calling credit.

On your computer, go to Hangouts at hangouts.google.com or in Gmail . Click the Phone tab . Click New conversation and then Add credit . Your calling credits, call and billing history will be shown in Google Voice .
